name: AppData_Roaming_new_directory
pattern: {"query": "select f.path,f.directory,u.username,f.hard_links,f.symlink,datetime(f.btime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as btime, datetime(f.atime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as atime, datetime(f.ctime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as ctime, datetime(f.mtime, 'unixepoch', 'UTC') as mtime from file f LEFT JOIN users u on f.uid=u.uid where f.path like 'C:\\users\\%\\AppData\\Roaming\\%' AND f.type='directory';", "interval": 1840, "description": "Check suspicious directory creation under %APPDATA% or %\\AppData\\Roaming - ATT&CK T1034,T1074,T1044", "platform": "windows", "removed": false}
